ygData.subject: Re: Hello Everyone
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/21/99 7:57:12 PM Pacific Daylight Time, paladin@intergate.bc.ca writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/21/99 7:57:12 PM Pacific Daylight Time,
paladin@... writes:

<< Perhaps we should consider David's idea of setting up this "GLBT" guild on
the new roleplaying server, Brell Serilis. We could all start from scratch
and learn about each other in a group of the same level. Sirenia is a Level
24 High Elven Cleric, but I would be willing to give it all up to start again
with all of you if you are interested. Then I am certain we would have enough
members to form a guild there. What does everyone think of this? >>


This idea sounds great to me! I'm willing to stand behind it! I think it'd be
great to get a whole gay/lesbian guild going!

Thyndo
Plains of Karana
CazicThule
